sentences.en: Sandman's experimentation has made him something of a cult figure on the local music scene.
sentences.cn: 桑德曼的实验已经使他成为当地音乐领域颇受人崇拜的人物。

sentences.en: Some contain live experimentation, but not always.
sentences.cn: 有些包含现场实验，但并不总是这样。

sentences.en: Leah easily could have fallen into a trap of feeling content; instead, her energy sparked a period of experimentation and renewal.
sentences.cn: 莉娅本是很容易落入满足的陷阱的；但相反地，她的活力激发了一个实验与更新的阶段。
